scriptExample.title: Combine Layers (Python)
scriptExample.para: This Python window script demonstrates how to combine multiple layer files into a single group layer file.
scriptExample.code:
# import the system modules import arcpy from arcpy import env
# load the OpenStreetMap specific toolbox arcpy.ImportToolbox(r'd:\projects\OSMEditor\WheelChairMap\OpenStreetMap Toolbox.tbx')
# combine multiple existing layers into a single group layer arcpy.GPCombineLayers_osmtools("stuttgart_osm_pt;stuttgart_osm_ln;stuttgart_osm_ply", "Innenstadt")
